data.comment: The match is underway. Oostende have kicked-off.
At Staaien, Andrew Hjulsager has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 23, Seung-Woo Lee (St. Truidense) has received a yellow card from Frederik Geldhof.
Oostende's Ari Skulason has been booked in Sint- Truiden.
At Staaien, Jorge Teixeira is shown a red card and sent off.
In the minute 44, Maxime D'Arpino for Oostende has been booked by Frederik Geldhof and receives a first yellow card.
The first half has been concluded at Staaien.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. St. Truidense kick-off.
In the minute 46, Buatu is on a sub for Seung-Woo Lee for St. Truidense.
The away team replace Indy Boonen with Makhtar Gueye.
Jelle Bataille (Oostende) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 64, Alexander Blessin is making the team's second substitution at Staaien with Cameron McGeehan replacing Maxime D'Arpino.
Oostende have been awarded a penalty in Sint- Truiden...
Alexander Blessin (Oostende) is making a third substitution, with Theo Ndicka replacing Robbie D'Haese.
In the minute 75, Jhonny Lucas is replacing Santiago Colombatto for St. Truidense at Staaien.
Oostende's Jelle Bataille has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
At Staaien, Makhtar Gueye has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 83, Anton Tanghe (Oostende) gets a yellow card.
The home team have replaced Facundo Colidio with Tatsuya Ito. This is the third substitution made today by Kevin Muscat.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
